link.title: Lowrey Populated Place Profile / Cherokee County, Oklahoma Data

meta.name: description
meta.content: Lowrey Populated Place Profile with maps, aerial photos, schools, hospitals, airports, real estate MLS listings and local jobs. Location: Cherokee County, OK, FID: 1100595, Latitude: 36.0981445312, Longitude: 36.0981445312.
Lowrey Populated Place Profile / Cherokee County, Oklahoma Data

Lowrey Populated Place Profile with maps, aerial photos, schools, hospitals, airports, real estate MLS listings and local jobs. Location: Cherokee County, OK, FID: 1100595, Latitude: 36.0981445312, Longitude: 36.0981445312.

meta.script: (function(doc) { var addEvent = 'addEventListener', type = 'gesturestart', qsa = 'querySelectorAll', scales = [1, 1], meta = qsa in doc ? doc[qsa]('meta[name=viewport]') : []; function fix() { meta.content = 'width=device-width,minimum-scale=' + scales[0] + ',maximum-scale=' + scales[1]; doc.removeEventListener(type, fix, true); } if ((meta = meta[meta.length - 1]) && addEvent in doc) { fix(); scales = [.25, 1.6]; doc[addEvent](type, fix, true); } }(document));

link.script: function setCookie( name, value, expires) { var domain = '.hometownlocator.com'; var path = '/'; var exp = ""; // set time, it's in milliseconds var today = new Date(); today.setTime( today.getTime() ); if (expires) { var ExpireDate = new Date (); ExpireDate.setTime(ExpireDate.getTime() + (expires * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)); exp = ExpireDate.toGMTString(); } var cookieStr = name + "=" +escape(value) + "; expires=" + exp + ";path=" + path + ";domain=" + domain; document.cookie = cookieStr; } setCookie('HTLMAPS','1','30');

img.alt: Oklahoma Community and City Profiles: HomeTownLocator.com

div.h1: Lowrey (in Cherokee County, OK) Populated Place Profile

div.p: Lowrey (GNIS FID: 1100595) is a populated place located in Cherokee County at latitude 36.098 and longitude -94.922.
The elevation of Lowrey is 1,089 feet. Lowrey appears on the Moodys U.S. Geological Survey Map. Cherokee County is in the Central Time Zone (UTC -6 hours).
Cherokee County: Cities & Towns | ZIP Codes | Features (airports, churches, hospitals, etc.)
Also See: Nearby Photos | Nearby Hotels | Driving Directions
div.script: function showLocation() { try { var address = document.getElementById("gcForm").q.value; if (address != '321 Main Street, City, OK 12345' && address != '') { var platform = new H.service.Platform({ 'app_id': 'XYf87xcWPSCHJXLhbfIB', 'app_code': 'IEFTsbhvoepq5vrOrCyl9A', 'useHTTPS': true, 'useCIT': false, }); var geocodingParams = { searchText: address }; var onResult = function(result) { var location = result.Response.View[0].Result; var thelat = location[0].Location.DisplayPosition.Latitude; thelat = parseFloat(thelat).toFixed(5); var thelon = location[0].Location.DisplayPosition.Longitude; thelon = parseFloat(thelon).toFixed(5); var theaddr = location[0].Location.Address.Label; theaddr = theaddr.replace(", United States", ""); theaddr = theaddr.replace(/,/g,"").toLowerCase(); window.location = "/maps/address/address-research,coord," + thelat + ":" + thelon + ",addr," + encodeURIComponent(theaddr) + ".cfm"; }; var geocoder = platform.getGeocodingService(); geocoder.geocode(geocodingParams, onResult, function(e) { console.log(e); }); } else { alert ("Please enter a valid street address and city and try again.") } }catch(err) { alert ("Sorry, we were unable to geocode that address. Please enter a valid street address and city and try again."); console.log(err)}; }
div.h2: Use HTL Address Research for a Oklahoma Address and get...

form.fieldset: Boundary Maps, Demographic Data, School Zones Review maps and data for the neighborhood, city, county, ZIP Code, and school zone. July 1, 2019, data includes home values, household income, percentage of homes owned, rented or vacant, etc.

link.script: var map; var ajaxRequest; var plotlist; var plotlayers=[]; var marker; function initmap() { // set up the map map = new L.Map('mymap'); // create the tile layer with correct attribution var osmUrl='https://1.base.maps.api.here.com/maptile/2.1/maptile/newest/normal.day/{z}/{x}/{y}/256/png8?app_id=XYf87xcWPSCHJXLhbfIB&app_code=IEFTsbhvoepq5vrOrCyl9A'; var osmAttrib='© 1987 - 2020 HERE | Terms of use'; var osm = new L.TileLayer(osmUrl, {minZoom: 5, maxZoom: 18, attribution: osmAttrib}); map.setView([36.0981445312, -94.9221801758],12); map.addLayer(osm); marker = L.marker([36.0981445312, -94.9221801758]).addTo(map); marker.bindPopup("Lowrey").openPopup(); } initmap();
